snippet: Thousands of Marshall Islanders have settled in northwestern Arkansas, where they find steady incomes but face health and cultural problems.
abstract: Thousands of Marshall Islanders have settled in northwestern Arkansas, seeking steady incomes while fleeing the disease and poverty that are rampant in their home country; Marshallese face strong cultural barriers to integration in the United States, and have had difficulty obtaining health care.
lead_paragraph: Thousands of Marshall Islanders have settled in northwestern Arkansas, where they find steady incomes but face health and cultural problems.

headline.seo: For Marshall Islanders, Hopes and Troubles in Arkansas
headline.main: For Pacific Islanders, Hopes and Troubles in Arkansas
headline.print_headline: For Pacific Islanders, Hopes and Troubles in Arkansas
